formattedAddress: 750 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 750 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text:
I had the pleasure of visiting Vision Lab for the first time for an annual eye exam. The team of staff are amazing . From the moment I walked in, I was greeted by a friendly and welcoming front desk staff. They offered me coffee or water while I waited, and I felt comfortable and relaxed in their modern and clean waiting area.

Although the selection of designer frames was somewhat limited, the eye exam more than made up for it.  Also, I was able to pick some frames to my liking. Dr.Pupparo is great,his attention to detail and level of expertise were impressive.  During the exam a greeting with my name appeared on the big screen. I felt like I was in a science fiction movie, transported to a course in school where I was learning all about my eyes as Dr.Pupparo was explaining and showing me the details of my eyes.

The eye exam itself was top-notch, and Dr.Pupparo explained everything in detail, making me feel at ease and comfortable. My insurance was accepted here which  was a plus. However,  if they don't accept your insurance  I would 100% recommend without a doubt to see Dr.Pupparo you will not regret it. This was by far the best eye exam I have ever received, and I wish I could give this place ten stars!

Overall, my experience was exceptional, and I left feeling satisfied and grateful for the excellent care I received. If you're looking for an optometrist with an amazing team of staff look no further than this practice.

originalText.text: 100% pleasant experience. The staff, assistants, and Dr. Pupparo are unfailingly friendly and knowledgeable.

text.text: 100% pleasant experience. The staff, assistants, and Dr. Pupparo are unfailingly friendly and knowledgeable.

originalText.text: Dropped in to Vision Lab in our neighborhood and saw Dr. Pupparo. What a great experience! Dr. Pupparo was extremely cordial and friendly, and explained every aspect of the exam and process with me. He went out of his way to be accommodating and make my otherwise very routine eye exam something I will now look forward to! Could not recommend him or his practice more highly!

text.text: Dropped in to Vision Lab in our neighborhood and saw Dr. Pupparo. What a great experience! Dr. Pupparo was extremely cordial and friendly, and explained every aspect of the exam and process with me. He went out of his way to be accommodating and make my otherwise very routine eye exam something I will now look forward to! Could not recommend him or his practice more highly!

originalText.text: Dr Pupparo saved the day for my niece! She is visiting from Chicago and lost her glasses right before we were to see wicked. Dr pupparo got her in and hooked her up with contacts so she could see. Thank you so much!!!

originalText.text: Dr. Pupparo is a pleasure and his practice includes an educated  and friendly staff. An upper west side gem!
